stories.title: The Empathy Trials
stories.author: Adventure Engine
stories.description: Society mandates 'perspective therapy' for criminals. When the technology malfunctions and a perpetrator becomes their victim, you must decide: judge who they were, who they are, or challenge the system itself.

stories.title: The Curator's Game
stories.author: Adventure Engine
stories.description: You're locked in a museum after hours, but it's not an accident. Someone—or something—has turned the building into an elaborate puzzle.

stories.title: The Lighthouse
stories.author: Adventure Engine
stories.description: A mysterious light beckons from an abandoned shore. What secrets does the old lighthouse hold?

stories.title: The Defector
stories.author: Adventure Engine
stories.description: A Russian asset wants out. You have 48 hours to extract them from Moscow before the FSB closes in.

stories.title: The Man on the Bench
stories.author: Adventure Engine
stories.description: A chance encounter with a kind old man in the park. But some people aren't what they seem.

stories.title: The Last Signal
stories.author: Adventure Engine
stories.description: Your ship intercepts a distress call from a vessel that disappeared 200 years ago. You're the only one close enough to respond.

stories.title: The Garden of Letters
stories.author: Adventure Engine
stories.description: After her mother's passing, Eleanor returns to tend the garden one last time. But among the roses, she finds letters that were never meant to be discovered.

stories.title: The Chess Maestro
stories.author: Adventure Engine
stories.description: Viktor Lenkov is the world's greatest chess player. But his real game is played in the shadows—where every move could be his last.

stories.title: The Aegean Falcon
stories.author: Adventure Engine
stories.description: Captain Nikos Stavridis flies F-16s and Mirage 2000s for the Hellenic Air Force. When tensions escalate over the Aegean, every decision could mean war—or peace.

stories.title: The Algorithm Knows
stories.author: Adventure Engine
stories.description: You wake up to find every device in your home locked. A message appears: 'We've been watching. We know what you did.'

stories.title: Perfect Match Protocol
stories.author: Adventure Engine
stories.description: Your dating app claims 99.9% compatibility through neural scanning. After matching with someone perfect, you're offered an upgrade: see your relationship's entire future. Do you look?

stories.title: The Salvage
stories.author: Adventure Engine
stories.description: Ty's salvage crew boards a derelict passenger liner that's been drifting for forty years. The ship's AI is still running—but it's been alone so long it's forgotten the difference between caring and keeping.
